scripts.dev: cross-env node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --no-progress --hide-modules --watch --config=node_modules/laravel-mix/setup/webpack.config.js & node_modules/http-server/bin/http-server output & watch 'php compile.php' resources/views
scripts.production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --no-progress --hide-modules --config=node_modules/laravel-mix/setup/webpack.config.js & node_modules/http-server/bin/http-server output & watch 'php compile.php' resources/views
